data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Kapurthala.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kapurthala, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 8,967 believers in Kapurthala to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 806,233 lost friends and neighbors.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Kapurthala, Punjab, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Kapurthala.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Rajput (Sikh traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, encourage the 8,967 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 796,342, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Kapurthala hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
